HOME.TICKETS_SALE:
Get your 4 day pass
at a special price only today!
HOME.APPS_TEXT: The complete guide with interactive map, gps positioning, find my car & tent, party schedule activities and hot notifications.

TICKETS.TAG_LINE: Choose what suits you the best
TICKETS.LOCATIONS:
To buy a Hard Copy Ticket, not an online e-ticket, please visit one of our Partner Locations around the country or the ones in the Eventim Network.
If you're coming from abroad and would like to purchase your ticket in a different currency than Romanian Lei, you can do it with our partner Festicket here.

To upgrade a ticket you already bought, please go to your account. The upgrade is available for Regular Camping (to Premium Camping), 1-Day Pass (to 4-Days Pass) and 4-Days Pass (to 4-Days Pass VIP).
TICKETS.TRY_AGAIN_LATER:
There was an error processing your request. Please try again in a few minutes.
Here's an adorable kitten instead.

Back to home page
TICKETS.FEST_TICKET:
Electric Castle has partnered with Festicket to offer you a wide range of Tickets & Accommodation Packages tailored specifically for our 2017 edition.

You can choose to get your Ticket now in €, £ or $ and come back later to get your accommodation. Or you can choose to get everything together and browse through pre-pitched tents on the campsite, Hostels or Hotels options. Have a look at their offering below:

SHOP.NO_PRODUCTS: Our awesome products will be available soon. Stay tuned!

BASKET.NO_PRODUCT: You currently do not have any products added to your cart.

CHECKOUT.TITLE: Checkout
CHECKOUT.DESCRIPTION: Following this option you will buy your ticket instantly using our online platform. The payment will be made using your debit/credit card. You will receive the confirmation of your payment and instructions on how to download your e-ticket(s) on your email.

EVENTIM.TITLE: Reserve on Eventim
EVENTIM.DESCRIPTION: You will be redirected to the Eventim platform where you can reserve your ticket for a week (7 days). This will keep your ticket “locked” until you will make the payment. You will have the options to either print your ticket(s) at home or pick-up a “physical” ticket from the Eventim Network.

ADDITIONAL_INFO.TOTALS: Shipping price and discount (if applicable) will be added to your cart total after you login.

ERROR.QUANTITY_EXCEEDED: Please check your order history or your cart.
ERROR.ONLY_FOUR_TICKETS: You can select only 4 passes of the same type.
ERROR.ONLY_SIX_TICKETS: You can select only 6 passes of the same type.
ERROR.ONLY_NINE_TICKETS: You can select only 9 passes of the same type.

ORDERS.NO_ORDER: You currently do not have any orders.

CANCEL_INSTALLMENTS.TITLE: Cancel payment plan
CANCEL_INSTALLMENTS.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to cancel your payment plan? By doing this you will lose your first 2 monthly payments.

UPDATE_CARD.TITLE: Update Credit Card Details
UPDATE_CARD.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to change your credit card details? To do this, you need to make the next monthly payment now. After this, the next payments will be automatically deducted from the new credit card. If you don't make the payment, your card details will remain unchanged.

PAY_FULL.TITLE: Pay Remainder Amount
PAY_FULL.MESSAGE: By choosing this option you can pay the remainder amount and end the payment plan now.

REGISTER.SING_UP_NEWSLETTER: Sign up for our awesome news and offers! We won’t spam you, we promise!
REGISTER.TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS: By clicking REGISTER you are agreeing to the Electric Castle Festival Terms & Conditions. And don’t worry. All your personal data is safe with us, you can read our Privacy Policy

SUCCESS.TITLE: All good! The payment has been made
SUCCESS.DESCRIPTION:
You will receive details in your email and you can also check the order(s) in your account.
If you need help, don’t hesitate to contact us at orders@electriccastle.ro

FAILED.TITLE: Something went wrong with your payment
FAILED.DESCRIPTION:
Your card details were wrong or your bank did not approve the transaction.
If you need help, don’t hesitate to contact us at orders@electriccastle.ro
